document.full_text: business travel demand is holding up better than price-sensitive leisure travel in a sign of business confidence and a recovery in world trade, the chief economist of global airlines body iata said on tuesday.
document.title: iata says business travel demand holds up, sign of recovery
lines_and_colors: business travel demand is holding up better than price-sensitive leisure travel in a sign of business confidence and a recovery in world trade, the chief economist of global airlines body iata said on tuesday.
